p: The whole herb of L. ilicifolius has been used as a folk medicine for treating hemostatic, inflammation, and ulcers in China. The cytotoxic activities of three lignans 132–134 isolated from L. ilicifolius were evaluated using the MTT assay against the PC12 cell line derived from rat adrenal pheochromocytoma [ 7]. Erythro-1-[(4-O-β-D-glucopyranosyl-3-methoxyl)-phenyl]-2-[(5’-methoxyl)-pinoresinol]-propane -1,3-diol ( 132) exhibited strong cytotoxic activity against PC12 cell line with an IC50 value of 1.22 ± 0.03 μmol/L, while sisymbrifolin and tortoside C was not cytotoxic.
